short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Forage search tool. Let no information be hidden!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forage allows you to search using Regex. You can also select where on a page you want to search, disregarding any unimportant information. 

Let The world's information be closer to your fingertips than ever before by using Forage.

Regex Search!

Find any numbers.
Find any word.
Find any symbol.
Find anything.

Scoped Search!

Select where on a page you want to search, and hone in
on your search, losing any unimportantinformation.
